```{r}
library(mvtnorm)
set.seed(9)
sig <- matrix(c(9, 5, 5, 4), nrow = 2)
x <- rmvnorm(200, sigma = sig, mean = c(20,40))
```

```{r}
x.1 = scale(x)
```


```{r}
e = eigen(cov(x.1))
Q =  eigen(cov(x.1))$vectors
```

```{r}


Q%*%diag(e)%*%t(Q)
```
